thread.title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
thread.title_full: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines

title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
text:
> Top News US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines In this Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 photo high school student Matthew Freitas, of Weymouth, Mass., center, takes a break with teammates during a game of flag football, in Weymouth. This weekend, Freitas will join other athletes with physical and visual disabilities hoping to get noticed at a scouting event for the U.S. Paralympics. (AP Photo/Steven Senne) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
